programme.desc: Tasya and Suji met in the park when both were dumped by their boyfriends at the same time. The two became closer because Tasya asked Suji to be her pretend boyfriend, so that her ex would be jealous of her. Because they are often together, their relationship becomes serious.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 219
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2 - EP 204
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. At first Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, the horse Maudy was riding accidentally got angry and fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Sujud Terakhir Ibuku (SPC Ramadhan)
programme.desc: Living a busy life makes Desi (Linda Ramadhanty) always grateful and not forget the 5 daily prayers. But not with Syarif, her husband and also Angga (Raeshard Octaviansha) and Karin (Michella Adlen) who forget to pray. Desi is never discouraged to continue praying that her husband and children will be guided. While depositing money into the bank, Syarif is pickpocketed and dies. Angga, who never knew about prayer, was reluctant to pray for his father and take care of his funeral.

programme.title: Sepahtu Reunion Al Puasa 2021 - EP 2
programme.desc: Sepahtu kembali dengan komedi pentas mengenai Ramadan untuk menghiburkan penonton.

programme.title: Chapalrela - EP 2
programme.desc: Anjang Merah kematian ibu dan terpaksa tinggal dengan ibu tirinya, Mak Jenab dan saudara tirinya Jali Puteh. Anjang Merah sentiasa didera juga ditugaskan menjaga kandang kambing ayahnya, Pak Manap.

programme.title: Une Affaire Criminelle - EP 8
programme.desc: Catherine has never been so close to achieving her aim. The truth finally seems to be within her grasp.

programme.title: Ethique Helvetique
programme.desc: What shaped Swiss thought? By analysing the history of the country, Tristan Miquel and Julien Girardin question the ethical and philosophical challenges facing their society and draw up parallels between the past and the present to stimulate reflection on different schools of thought.

programme.title: Deux Femmes
programme.desc: 1965. Colette, a woman of so-called loose morals, is wrongly accused of murder by misogynist policemen. Anne-Marie, a young examining magistrate, is given the case. Will she manage to stand up to her chauvinistic superiors? Inspired by real life, the film recounts the combat of two women of opposing temperaments.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 22
programme.desc: An in-depth look at the hairdresser Christophe-Nicolas Biot. All about wearing knickers. Under the Viaduc des Arts, encounter with Nolwenn de Kergommeaux and the stained glass artists of Au Passeur de Lumiere. Haute couture falls in love with the train. Orta launches the first viscose that is truly 100% European.

programme.title: Les Mots De L'ombre
programme.desc: Every week, prisoners held at Baie-Mahault prison in Guadeloupe mentally escape from reality by reading thanks to the presence of volunteers from the ''Lire pour en sortir'' (Reading to pull through) charity. Bonds are formed, dialogue unfolds, horizons open up in terms of knowledge and representation of the world.

programme.desc: Sebastien Lacassagne, a young owner of a vineyard, is found murdered. The prosecutor elisabeth Richard and Captain Martinez launch an investigation. The list of suspects gets longer as they make progress, without counting a journalist who draws their attention to a murder that took place two years earlier.

programme.title: 20h30 Le Dimanche
programme.desc: Film, music, sport, literature, politics... Laurent Delahousse's guests talk about themselves and their lives, their careers and their projects, and discuss the news making the headlines of the day. The programme closes with a live musical performance.

programme.title: Des Racines Et Des Ailes - EP 1
programme.desc: The Brittany Customs Path, walked by nine million people every year, is an incredible concentration of Brittany, its natural wonders and its heritage. Also known as the GR34, it follows the coastline for 2,000 kilometres, from Mont-Saint-Michel to Saint-Nazaire.

programme.title: Opj - EP 17
programme.desc: As the sun rises, Sergeant Alice Bontemps is practicing yoga on the lagoon, when she is suddenly confronted with a particularly macabre scene: the lifeless body of a young jet-setter, murdered after a very exclusive beach party.

programme.title: Opj - EP 18
programme.desc: Jackson asks Alice if she wants to head the investigation, as she was the one to discover the body. But the deeper she delves into this world of image and pretence, the more the truth seems to be masked by appearances.

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planete B - EP 4
programme.desc: In less than fifty years the planet has lost 70% of its bird, mammal, amphibian and reptile populations. But what is biodiversity, and how does it affect us directly? Caroline Nieberding, a biologist at UCLouvain, has some explanations and possible solutions.

programme.title: PGA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Arnold Palmer Invitational presented by Mastercard is one of the premier-event jewels on the PGA Tour. programme.desc: Match Officials Mic'd Up returns for a seventh episode of the 2024/25 season, with PGMOL Chief Refereeing Officer Howard Webb joining Michael Owen to discuss key decisions from recent Premier League Matchweeks, using previously un-released audio between the on-field officials and VAR teams.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 22
programme.desc: Head of the PGMOL, Howard Webb is in the studio for this week's Big Interview, candidly opening up about his personal story and how he got into the game. Webb reflects on various moments throughout his life and career including that infamous decision not to issue a red card in the 2010 World Cup Final, implementing VAR and where he sees the technology going, as well as his hopes that referees will continue to be more inclusive in the Premier League.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 14

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 34
programme.desc: A product of Barcelona's famed La Masia youth academy, Cesc Fabregas is rightly remembered as one of the greatest midfield players of his generation. After making his Arsenal debut at just 16 years of age the diminutive Spaniard would go on to win titles in both England and Spain as well as becoming a World Cup winner in 2010. Now taking his first steps into coaching with Como 1907, Fabregas reflects on his footballing education as well as his hopes for the future in management.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 2

programme.desc: Widely regarded as the best left-back in Premier League history, Ashley Cole joins Steve Bower on 1-to-11 to select his all-time best eleven teammates. They dig into his career, recalling standout players and memorable moments.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 40
programme.desc: The Premier League's success is down to all the incredible people working tirelessly on all different aspects of one of the best leagues in the world. An increasing number of these people are women, and we want to highlight the achievements of those who work behind the scenes at Premier League clubs.

programme.title: THE ART OF... - EP 3

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 34
programme.desc: A product of Barcelona's famed La Masia youth academy, Cesc Fabregas is rightly remembered as one of the greatest midfield players of his generation. After making his Arsenal debut at just 16 years of age the diminutive Spaniard would go on to win titles in both England and Spain as well as becoming a World Cup winner in 2010. Now taking his first steps into coaching with Como 1907, Fabregas reflects on his footballing education as well as his hopes for the future in management.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 37
programme.desc: A player of flair and flamboyance for Sir Alex Ferguson's Manchester United, the story of Nani from the streets of Lisbon is one of defying the odds. Nani retraces his footsteps across Portugal's capital, visiting old clubs and former coaches, the neighbourhood he learnt to survive in, as well as new ventures afoot.

programme.title: PL MASTERCLASS - EP 2
programme.desc: Some of the Premier League's biggest stars take us onto the pitch to discuss the techniques and thought processes that allow them to perform at the highest level. Featuring Milos Kerkez, Thomas Frank, Adam Wharton and Cole Palmer.

programme.title: CLASSIC MATCH 10/11
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2010/2011 season.

programme.title: FS MMA Anthony Figueroa vs. Pete Sabala
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! This contest goes the distance and victory is well deserved for one fighter when Anthony "Antdawg" Figueroa and Pete Sabala go toe to toe in a catch weight bout at 137 pounds from San Jose, CA, USA.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Paul Williams vs. Erislandy Lara
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a welterweight bout between former champion Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (39-2, 27 KOs) and up and comer Erislandy Lara, aka 'The American Dream", 15-0, 10 KOs). The fight took place at Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on July 9, 2011.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavily-anticipated contest featuring two of boxing's greats - Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Oscar De La Hoya. This fight set the record for most pay-per-view buys, as 2.4 million purchases led to over $135 million in revenue. The winner of this closely-contested bout would be WBC light middleweight champion.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Goeido, Ichinojo, Daieisho and Kotoeko from the Aki basho, 2019.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Dmitry Priog vs. Daniel Jacobs
programme.desc: This episode features a middleweight battle between Dmitry Priog and Daniel Jacobs that ends in a crushing overhand right, as well as kickboxing, sumo, weapons and more!

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode is highlighted by a heartfelt interview with the legendary MMA Hall of Famer Tito Ortiz that shows you sides of the former champ you never knew from his childhood to his love of fishing to the man he is today. We stop by "Cowboy" Donald Cerrone's ranch to see you don't need the flashiest training equipment to be a world class fighter. Plus Nate Marquardt gets his dream car and UFC ring girls bring us on a tour of a new gym.

programme.title: Mega Fights In 60 Joel Julio vs.James Kirkland
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a Super Welterweight, 10 Round contest featuring Joel Julio (34-2, 31 KOs) vs.undefeated James Kirkland, aka 'Mandingo Warrior' (24-0, 21 KOs) from the HP Pavilion in San Jose, California, USA on March 3, 2009.

programme.title: WCCB Tim Tszyu vs. Sebastian Fundora
programme.desc: From the T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, undefeated Super Welterweight World Champion Tim Tszyu travels from Australia to defend his title against former World Champion Sebastian Fundora. Fundora stands 6'5", and is known for his all-action and exciting style. He replaces an injured Keith Thurman, and jumps into a World Title match-up against one of boxing's rising stars in Tszyu.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Martin Rodriguez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Adrien Broner taking on Martin Rodriguez to determine the new WBO super featherweight world champion. With both fighters looking for their first major world championship, one left hook will bring about a new champion. Also on the card, action from multi-weight champion Paul Williams and Verno Phillips.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.desc: Episode 6: Bandung, Indonesia - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Pencak Silat and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet, Throws and Weapons featuring Masters Rita Suwanda and Dadang Gunawan.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roy Jones Jr. vs. Glenn Thomas
programme.desc: At the time of this matchup of two undefeated Middleweights, Roy Jones Jr. was gaining attention as one of the most exciting young fighters in the sport and steadily climbing up the rankings, in the top ten across the four main sanctioning bodies. He faces Glenn Thomas, 24-0, who travelled to Jones' hometown of Pensacola, Florida in a meeting that would bring a shot at the World Title for the winner.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Travel to the Miami, Florida to witness fitness fanatics face off in the Southeast finals. 30 contestants from across the region have arrived to the tropical coastal city, and the competition is heating up! All these athletes aspire to advance to the nationals in Las Vegas, where Mount Midoriyama waits, and the winner receives half a million dollars plus the coveted title of American Ninja Warrior. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Keith Thurman vs. Carlos Quintana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the undefeated Keith Thurman taking on Carlos Quintana. Also on the card, kickboxing super heavyweight legend Daniel Ghita faces off against Brice Guidon.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features interviews with 2-time UFC heavyweight champion Frank Mir where he discusses his "Legend" Status and his UFC debut, as well as an interview with his wife and manager Jenny Mir and how she juggles motherhood and her husband's career. UFC President Dana White stops by and checks out some possible TUF competitors.

programme.desc: Crashed UFOs. Recovered alien entities. For decades, incredible claims have been made about an extraterrestrial presence on Earth-and the government has gone to great lengths to discredit them.

programme.title: Kings Of Pain (S2) - EP 9
programme.desc: It's America vs. Australia in a battle royale of pain administered by sharks. But after getting stung by both, Adam and Rob realise that when their countries win, they lose.

programme.desc: As the participants get past the shock of being dropped in the wild, the ability to think outside the box proves fruitful to some but a detriment to others.

programme.desc: From Evel Knievel to Harry Houdini, host Peyton Manning counts down the top ten daredevils of all time, as voted by a panel of experts. Which of these record-breaking junkies gets your heart pumping?

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24) - EP 613
programme.desc: Rick and Corey check out a 1968 convertible. Will the negotiations be speedy, or will the duo dodge a bad deal? Chum wants a piece of an Oreodont fossil. But can he get a dino-mite price?

programme.title: History's Greatest Heists With Pierce Brosnan (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: A mob-connected heist crew the FBI described as "the best ever" takes down a southern California bank in 1972, getting away with millions in cash allegedly linked to President Richard Nixon.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S8) - EP 46
programme.desc: Competitor turned judge Ben Abbott remains undefeated in the forge, but that could all change. In this challenge, three smiths make a signature blade out of scrap steel from past competitions.

programme.title: Alone (S10) - EP 4
programme.desc: As the participants get into a rhythm, loneliness settles in for the survivalists. One small choice proves to be a disastrous mistake for a participant, while another has an encounter with a predator.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4) - EP 13
programme.desc: They've been called the world's greatest archaeological enigma. 2,000-year-old geoglyphs made in the Peruvian desert that span over 50 miles. The drawings are so massive, they can be seen from the air.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4) - EP 14
programme.desc: During WWII, the Nazis stole vast amounts of art, gold, silver, and currency, and stashed them across Europe. While some of the plunder has been recovered, much more is still missing nearly 80 years later.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: Black Girl Missing
programme.desc: Companion piece to the movie Black Girl Missing. While the media goes into a frenzy over missing white girls, Black women's disappearances receive muted coverage and limited police resources.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2) - EP 10
programme.desc: When an otherwise healthy woman is admitted to the hospital with sudden organ failure, an anonymous tip leads authorities to investigate a pattern of deaths in her family and a shocking prime suspect.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: On 24th September 2019, 20-year-old Tashan Daniel is on his way to watch his beloved Arsenal FC play Nottingham Forest, but a brutal attack at the train station ends the talented athlete's hopes.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3) - EP 11
programme.desc: A Florida woman hides in her bathroom when a strange man breaks into her home in the middle of the night. A man trapped in his overturned truck calls 911 in a panic as the vehicle fills with icy water.

programme.title: The First 48 (S22) - EP 401
programme.desc: In Mobile, when a homeless woman is found executed in an alley and a father of five is shot in a desolate area, detectives rely on clues from one case to help solve the other.

programme.title: The Double Kidnap Of Teddy Wang
programme.desc: The two kidnaps of Hong Kong tycoon Teddy Wang resulted in the world's largest ransoms, and a court battle over his estate between his father and his wife.

programme.title: The Garden City Butcher
programme.desc: Passing himself off as a friendly tourist in Singapore, he preyed on unsuspecting travellers, bludgeoning them to death before disposing their chopped up bodies.

programme.title: 60 Days In (S8) - EP 12
programme.desc: After the remaining participant leaves the program, the sheriff and her staff process how to implement the feedback as the inmates continue serving their time.

programme.desc: Young adults learn the hard way that their actions have consequences. Three young men exploring abandoned buildings get charged with felony burglary.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2) - EP 11
programme.desc: When reliable 22-year-old, Molly Jane Matheson, didn't show up for work, her mother Tracy drove to her Fort Worth, Texas apartment to check on her.

programme.title: Digital Addiction - EP 4
programme.desc: Jocelyn, 29, dreams of being Insta-famous. Her family ignores her online addiction, leaving Jocelyn at risk. Nicholas will stop at nothing to achieve his dream of becoming a respected content creator.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5) - EP 144
programme.desc: A shocking turn of events in a murder trial: a mother confronts the woman who stole her baby; a grieving widow screams at the man who killed her husband; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5) - EP 145
programme.desc: A domestic violence defendant loses his temper during a virtual hearing; grieving parents speak directly to their sons' killer; a judge has strong words for a teen arsonist; and more.

programme.desc: Detectives in Atlanta find a woman's body in a trashcan; in Louisville, a domestic dispute turns into a homicide investigation and in Birmingham, doing a favor for a friend costs one man his life.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou - EP 4
programme.desc: The tire track found at the Donna Bennett Johnston crime scene provided police with a long list of potential suspects, everyone in the Baton Rouge area who had purchased an Aquatred tire.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest - EP 6
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. Two senior citizens get locked up for trespassing while trapping stray cats; a man is arrested after pouring milk on his head.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest - EP 7
programme.desc: A suspect flees from a high-speed car chase while carrying her infant child. State troopers catch a man with a stolen utility pole strapped to the roof of his car.

programme.desc: Detectives gather crucial information about a double-homicide from neighbourhood surveillance footage, but they're not able to identify and track the killer until some key digital data is uncovered.

programme.desc: A member of a paranormal investigative team is caught by a ghost. A couple pulls off a highway to get footage of what might be Bigfoot. Plus, more paranormal footage you have to see to believe.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S6) - EP 1
programme.desc: A 68-year-old father shoots his daughter's boyfriend when the couple arrives at the family home. Believing his daughter is trapped in an abusive relationship, he fires three shots.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: Shayna Hubers takes the stand to defend herself after she brutally murdered her on-again, off-again boyfriend, Ryan Poston. She willingly takes the stand to prove her actions were in self-defense.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15) - EP 100

programme.desc: Kerri has an online gambling addiction that is tearing her family apart. Devonte's gaming addiction makes Lisa question his ability to be a good father and husband.

programme.desc: Ben travels to Thailand to meet Paul and Sao, who he first visited in Cambodia. Paul and his family have build their version of an English castle.

programme.title: Secret Science S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Matt Okine discovers that when it comes to making babies, it's not always easy. He's surprised to learn in the last 40 years, men's sperm count has dropped by 50%. So what men can do to improve that number? (Part 1)

programme.title: Save This Shark S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Mick Fanning continues his mission by travelling to the world's shark hotspots, where he gets a closer look at the incredible apex predators.

programme.title: Elevator Pitch S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Memory is crucial to survival. But do we even know, what memory is? Rad challenges neuroscientist, Dr Yee Lian Chew, to explain in an elevator ride.

programme.title: How Deadly S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Forget the stereotypes. There is more to bats then disease and demons. Dr Ann Jones unpacks why these 'flying farmers' might be Australia's most misunderstood animal.

programme.title: Australian Story (2025) - EP 5
programme.desc: When celebrated artist Vincent Fantauzzo first appeared on Australian Story, he held something back about his past. Now he's ready to reveal all.

programme.title: The World (2025) - EP 38
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Weeknights at 9pm AEDT, Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from correspondents and interviews with guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 51
programme.desc: Start your day with the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. James Glenday and Bridget Brennan bring you news and interviews joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 51
programme.desc: When you need to know what's going on in the morning, turn to Gemma Veness for up to the minute news and events as they unfold. Plus the latest in politics, business, sport with Catherine Murphy and weather with Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 51
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Landline (2025) - EP 3
programme.desc: A barramundi farming success in the Northern Territory, plus the impact of bird flu on egg farms and egg shortages.

programme.title: A Bite To Eat With Alice S1 - EP 47
programme.desc: Star of Love on the Spectrum and Austin, Michael Theo looks to Alice for tips on cooking for that special someone.

programme.title: Four Corners (2025) - EP 6
programme.desc: Four Corners investigates the Australian War Memorial's ties to weapons makers and a controversial transformation.

programme.title: Media Watch (2025) - EP 6
programme.desc: It's the show everybody loves until they're on it. Media Watch returns with a new host. Sitting in the hot seat will be four-time Walkley award-winner Linton Besser, an investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent.

programme.title: Great Southern Landscapes S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Art lover Rachel Griffiths travels to Western Australia to find the exact spot where Narelle Autio framed her iconic 2004 snapshot.

programme.title: Creative Types With Virginia Trioli S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: The comedian's comedian, Tom Gleeson has had no other job but standing on a stage making people laugh since his university days. What's the secret to his incredible work ethic and success?

programme.title: Art Works S3 - EP 30
programme.desc: Guest host Rowdie Walden is at Desert Mob with Hetti Perkins; we meet Marrugeku's Dalisa Pigram in Broome; Angelina Hurley shares her father Ron's legacy; we follow the Journey Down; and slam poet Laurie May performs. (Final)

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing (2025) - EP 33
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to experts on issues driving the news cycle in an election year.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: How do you tell dusk from dawn in the age of climate change? Host Nikolaj Coster-Waldau begins his global journey to find out.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Shelter is one of humanity's most basic needs. As the global population grows, how can we rethink the way we live to build a more sustainable tomorrow?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Nature's ability to regenerate existed long before humans inhabited the Earth. What can we learn from its innate ability to help fix the damage we've done?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: In a world where global warming has made food harder to grow, how we plant and harvest are critical issues when it comes to adapting to climate change.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Endeavor & TKO CEO Ari Emanuel to discuss how he built a multi-billion dollar sports and entertainment empire, the future of Hollywood and what's next.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Instacart CEO Fidji Simo in her hometown in the South of France, and learns about her journey from a small fishing village to the C-Suite in Silicon Valley.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets AMD CEO Lisa Su on the heels of her 10-year anniversary as CEO at the chipmaker's labs in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets NBA player & Thirty Ink CEO Stephen Curry to discuss his growing business portfolio, partnership with Under Armour and retail ambitions to rival Nike's Jordan Brand.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Emily Chang interviews JPMorgan Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon, a titan in the banking industry known for his freewheeling style, about his outlook on markets, tech and geopolitical risk.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Inside Mark Zuckerberg's AI Era. Mark Zuckerberg discusses how Meta's newest AI model Llama 3.1 will shape the future of business, technology and society.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance Radio
programme.desc: The economy and the markets are "under surveillance" as we cover the latest in finance, economics and investment. Join Tom Keene, Paul Sweeney, Lisa Mateo, Michael Barr and other guests.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has begun to exhibit early signs of agency. Are we on a path to superintelligence? Self destruction? Or is the potential promise and threat of AI being overblown?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Bioacoustics technology and AI are revealing how animals communicate, and may soon allow us to talk to them ourselves. What can we learn from wildlife? And should we be talking to the animals at all?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: With the promise of unimaginable computing power, a global race for quantum supremacy is raging. Who will be first to harness this new technological force, and what will they do with it?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Water. Our survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking. Can technology help secure humanity's future water needs?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Soon, another billion people will be online. How will these new users embrace this technology to transform their lives, and what will it mean for the rest of the world?

programme.title: The Growing Toll of America's Booming Kratom Industry
programme.desc: In this Bloomberg Originals documentary, we reveal how the unregulated substance is being promoted and even made more potent, and how some users are ending up dead.

programme.title: How India's Narendra Modi Took Power
programme.desc: Narendra Modi, India's prime minister, is both highly popular and deeply polarizing. How did he get to the top of Indian politics, and what do his policies mean for the country's future?

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: In a Kampala slum, a group of midwives help vulnerable mothers give birth for free. Under a mile away, a private hospital is out of reach for most of the community, with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Fake permits, undercover informants and millions of dollars. How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Last year alone, an estimated $1 trillion was lost globally to fraud. With law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 2
programme.desc: The Green Bible is the single-most important document in the Italian government's war against an alleged Nigerian mafia. But this supposed mafia handbook isn't what it claims to be at all.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 3
programme.desc: The tale of the strange life and stranger murder of a rare violin collector and his daughter, as told by their friends and two suspects at the heart of the police investigation.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets some of the world's most advanced, intelligent, robots. Will the creation of a synthetic species with human-like intelligence improve the human experience, or end it?

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Can we have real intimacy with machines? Emily Chang explores the future of such connections and the technologies powering a growing market of relationships-on-demand.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: From brain implants that allow paralyzed patients to communicate to the wearable devices enhancing our capabilities, brain-computer interfaces could change the way we use our minds forever.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: From birth to death, tech is stretching the boundaries of biology. In this episode of Posthuman, we explore the discoveries that could transform reproduction, healthcare and how we die.

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: Americans Cash in on a Paddle-Sport Obsession. Pickleball is the hottest sport in America. In the premiere of "Next in Sports," we test the case for the paddle craze.

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: How Formula One Finally Hooked America. Not so long ago it was the circuits of Monaco and Monza that epitomized Formula 1. Its modern ambitions, however, are more Miami.

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: How to Build a Brand New Sport. Despite Teqball being relatively unknown, the sport's creators have big plans for it. Can you build any game into a mainstream sport if you have the will and the money?

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: The American Cornhole League wants to transform cornhole from Americana staple to worldwide phenomenon.

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: Next in Sports explores new sports, as well as innovations in existing pastimes, illustrating what's happening around the corner and across the globe.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Denver, Colorado: come for the sunshine, stay for the community of tech mavericks. From rocket engines to sci-fi weapons, the next great US tech firm may already be taking shape in the Mountain West.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Switzerland is full of advanced tech startups. We visit an inventor who makes drones do miraculous things and a company that's growing human skin in a lab.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: From a company that helps restore movement in the paralysed to brain-research labs combining neuroscience and AI, Switzerland is home to some of the most advanced research on the brain.

programme.title: Hello World

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: The Nigerian tech boom has been fuelled by payments and mobile tech. As the country looks to leapfrog ahead, it's turning to an ambitious young workforce.

programme.title: 2-Hour News Show (Rerun)
programme.desc: 2 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 3 - 5 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The New Zealanders
programme.desc: The New Zealanders is a beautifully shot series introducing us to some of the quirkiest locations and heart-warming characters throughout New Zealand.

programme.title: The World From Above S1
programme.desc: A highly popular, breathtaking series of aerial programmes offering an entirely different view of the world. From 10,000ft down to just a few feet above the ground, we discover new perspectives through thrilling journeys: from mountains and the world's most picturesque cities, to fantastic castles and the great natural wonders of the globe.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Waktunya Srimulat Bercyanda
programme.desc: Nunung is a rich widow who has an only child (Anita Hara). Nunung already has a husband-to-be and wants to get married but is embarrassed because Anita hasn't gotten married yet. Meanwhile, Anita, who also has a husband-to-be (Bedu), doesn't want to get married if her mother (Nunung) isn't married yet.

programme.title: Land Of Santri
programme.desc: Documentary program that tells the daily life of the students at the leading Islamic boarding schools in Indonesia. Land of Santri will open the eyes of the audience with a storyline that often describes the unique and positive curriculum on education in each pesantren so that it can produce quality graduates. The State of Santri provides insight that pesantren education has a quality that is not inferior to other general education.

programme.title: Cahaya Ramadan
programme.desc: An Islamic Talkshow program that is studied in depth with a Doctor of Philosophy, Fahrudin Faiz, the pioneer of "Ngaji Filsafat" and hosted by Maman Suherman or commonly called "Kang Maman".

programme.title: Ruang Makna
programme.desc: A program that discusses the meaning of words that are often heard and used every day in the context of life. Presented concisely and easy to understand.

programme.title: Sport's Tale
programme.desc: Apart from being competitive, there are still many unique stories behind sports. The philosophy of sports club logos, to how much money is needed for a racing event, is discussed in this program.

programme.title: Why We Ride
programme.desc: The journey of 3 (three) different individuals participating in the World Major Marathon.

programme.title: Sportlite
programme.desc: Find the history and unique story in every sport branches with Sportlite.

programme.title: Beyond The Limit
programme.desc: Stories of young people who have pursued their dreams from an early age.

programme.title: Sportrip Indonesia
programme.desc: Sportrip Indonesia tries to explore Indonesian sports that combine extreme and traditional sports with the natural beauty of Indonesia.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: The Land Of Spices
programme.desc: Indonesia is famous for its rich spices. This program provides an in-depth insight into each spice, its benefits for life and health. All information is conveyed in a modern yet humorous way.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)

programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 16
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: The Midnight Studio - EP 2
programme.desc: The series tells a thrilling story of mean photographer Seo Ki Joo (Joo Won) who runs a photo studio that exists only for the deceased, passionate lawyer Han Boo (Kwon Nara) and the eerie night visitors, who travel between life and death.

programme.title: Treasures Around - EP 23
programme.desc: The quirky and clever Shan Dandan (Xu Lu), who dreams of becoming a jade appraiser, crosses paths with Pei Pei (Bi Wen Jun), the wayward heir to a jade business. Initially at odds, the two develop a love-hate relationship as they face challenges together.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1904
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Darkside of the Moon - EP 6
programme.desc: She Manyue (Tavia Yeung) appears to be a glamorous and skilled crisis management expert, but she has a tragic past. Eighteen years ago, she and her sister were assaulted by wealthy heir Jiang Jijun (Edward Ma), leading to a devastating upheaval in her family.

programme.title: Kill Me Love Me - EP 14
programme.desc: The story follows Prince Murong Jinghe of the Dayan Kingdom (Liu Xueyi) and a young girl Mei Lin (Wu Jinyan), from Qingzhou, as they support each other through the tides of fate. They bravely defy destiny, risking their lives to break free and persevere.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1904
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 15
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 16
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: Mental Coach Jegal - EP 5
programme.desc: A former Taekwondo athlete, who is permanently banned from the national team, becomes a mental coach to help players in slump, heal retired athletes and engage a real match against the absurd world of winner-take-all.

programme.title: Treasures Around - EP 23
programme.desc: The quirky and clever Shan Dandan (Xu Lu), who dreams of becoming a jade appraiser, crosses paths with Pei Pei (Bi Wen Jun), the wayward heir to a jade business. Initially at odds, the two develop a love-hate relationship as they face challenges together.

programme.title: Forensic JD - EP 7
programme.desc: While assisting the police in their investigation and trying to reverse the case involving her father, forensic doctor Song An Yan (Charlene Choi) joins hands with hot-blooded detective Liu Zhi Ming (Joseph Chang) in their desperate search for the truth.

programme.title: Golden City - EP 577
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1904
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Darkside of the Moon - EP 7
programme.desc: She Manyue (Tavia Yeung) appears to be a glamorous and skilled crisis management expert, but she has a tragic past. Eighteen years ago, she and her sister were assaulted by wealthy heir Jiang Jijun (Edward Ma), leading to a devastating upheaval in her family.

programme.title: The Midnight Studio - EP 3
programme.desc: The series tells a thrilling story of mean photographer Seo Ki Joo (Joo Won) who runs a photo studio that exists only for the deceased, passionate lawyer Han Boo (Kwon Nara) and the eerie night visitors, who travel between life and death.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1905
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 1
programme.desc: The story tells of Ji Ying Ying (Tan Song Yun) from the Huahua Dyehouse during the Tang Dynasty. She bravely faces foreign invaders and guards her dyeing techniques. Later, she creatively spreads these methods overseas, becoming the Dyeing Ambassador of Tang.

programme.title: Darkside of the Moon - EP 8
programme.desc: She Manyue (Tavia Yeung) appears to be a glamorous and skilled crisis management expert, but she has a tragic past. Eighteen years ago, she and her sister were assaulted by wealthy heir Jiang Jijun (Edward Ma), leading to a devastating upheaval in her family.

programme.title: Kill Me Love Me - EP 16
programme.desc: The story follows Prince Murong Jinghe of the Dayan Kingdom (Liu Xueyi) and a young girl Mei Lin (Wu Jinyan), from Qingzhou, as they support each other through the tides of fate. They bravely defy destiny, risking their lives to break free and persevere.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1906
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Love's Rebellion - EP 18
programme.desc: Nan Yan (Jing Tian) joins the Yangyue Sect to study poison techniques in order to treat her mother's heart condition. She inadvertently forms a 'marriage bond' with Emperor Ji Yang (Krien Zhang) and gets entangled in a huge conspiracy.

programme.title: Love's Rebellion - EP 19
programme.desc: Nan Yan (Jing Tian) joins the Yangyue Sect to study poison techniques in order to treat her mother's heart condition. She inadvertently forms a 'marriage bond' with Emperor Ji Yang (Krien Zhang) and gets entangled in a huge conspiracy.

programme.title: Links To Temptation - EP 12
programme.desc: The subtle relationship between Barrister SHING WAI-SHUN (Steven Ma) and pole dancer HUNG LONG-KIU (Fala Chen) begins with a cell phone. KIU has been treating SHUN hot and cold. On top of his he also finds her somewhat unpredictable so he decides to check her out secretly. His good friend KWAN HO-CHING (Yoyo Mung) discovers that KIU is going out with rich businessman KO WING-TAI (Lau Tan). Under SHUN’s questioning, KIU confesses she is coveting TAI’s money, telling him to give up his hope.

programme.title: Go! Go! Go! Operation C9 - EP 6
programme.desc: The organization to which agent C9 Yue Siu-Kiu (Samantha Ko) belongs is eradicated. Lonesome Siu-kiu encounters vegetable vendor Ko Tai-king (Kenneth Ma). After getting married, she takes care of her father-in-law Ko Au (Lee Ka Ting), big sister-in-law Ko Ching-lai (Yuen Kit Yee), younger brother-in-law Ko Tai-kiu (Brian Chu) and stepson Ko Hei-long, who collectively make up a dysfunctional family. She has become a proper housewife after five years.

programme.title: Freedom Memories - EP 6
programme.desc: Longtime friends Lau Tak-wing (Dickson Yu) and Chai Hing-chau (Karl Ting) are so eager to be admitted into the Artist Training Program that they push each other to their physical limits. In their dogged pursuit for stardom, the pair is joined by Keung Chi-ngan (Tiffany Lau), who was the first runner-up for Miss Hong Kong, and actress/showbiz baby Wan Chor-yue (Joey Thye), among others, on their journey towards living their dreams.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES - EP 8
programme.desc: Ching wins, but the raving Chau greatly annoys to invade Wong. At the end ,all of them are driven out of the Island. Afterwards, Ching and Yung have to overcome many obstacles before they can be reunited again._x000D_On the other hand, Hong and the Kam Emperor, in order to invade the Sung Dynasty , Plot to steal Wu’s book ’ The Art of War’ from Sung. Their conspiracy is know by Ching and Yung , and they vow to protect their own country.

programme.title: Crimson Sabre - EP 27
programme.desc: The Government in late Qing Dynasty was so corrupt that good and loyal officials and their families were being exterminated. Among these victims were Woon and his son Chi (Lam Ka Tung). Fortunately, Chi was saved by the "Golden Snake" Yi (Kong Wa) and was sent to learn martial arts in Wah Shan. Yi, on the other hand, went to take revenge on the Wan’s, the renowned house of bandits, and took hostage of their daughter Yee (Melissa Ng).

Among these victims were Woon and his son Chi (Lam Ka Tung). Fortunately, Chi was saved by the "Golden Snake" Yi (Kong Wa) and was sent to learn martial arts in Wah Shan. Yi, on the other hand, went to take revenge on the Wan’s, the renowned house of bandits, and took hostage of their daughter Yee (Melissa Ng).

programme.title: Crimson Sabre - EP 30
programme.desc: The Government in late Qing Dynasty was so corrupt that good and loyal officials and their families were being exterminated. Among these victims were Woon and his son Chi (Lam Ka Tung). Fortunately, Chi was saved by the "Golden Snake" Yi (Kong Wa) and was sent to learn martial arts in Wah Shan. Yi, on the other hand, went to take revenge on the Wan’s, the renowned house of bandits, and took hostage of their daughter Yee (Melissa Ng).

programme.title: Links To Temptation - EP 13
programme.desc: The subtle relationship between Barrister SHING WAI-SHUN (Steven Ma) and pole dancer HUNG LONG-KIU (Fala Chen) begins with a cell phone. KIU has been treating SHUN hot and cold. On top of his he also finds her somewhat unpredictable so he decides to check her out secretly. His good friend KWAN HO-CHING (Yoyo Mung) discovers that KIU is going out with rich businessman KO WING-TAI (Lau Tan). Under SHUN’s questioning, KIU confesses she is coveting TAI’s money, telling him to give up his hope.

programme.title: Go! Go! Go! Operation C9 - EP 7
programme.desc: The organization to which agent C9 Yue Siu-Kiu (Samantha Ko) belongs is eradicated. Lonesome Siu-kiu encounters vegetable vendor Ko Tai-king (Kenneth Ma). After getting married, she takes care of her father-in-law Ko Au (Lee Ka Ting), big sister-in-law Ko Ching-lai (Yuen Kit Yee), younger brother-in-law Ko Tai-kiu (Brian Chu) and stepson Ko Hei-long, who collectively make up a dysfunctional family. She has become a proper housewife after five years.

programme.title: Freedom Memories - EP 6
programme.desc: Longtime friends Lau Tak-wing (Dickson Yu) and Chai Hing-chau (Karl Ting) are so eager to be admitted into the Artist Training Program that they push each other to their physical limits. In their dogged pursuit for stardom, the pair is joined by Keung Chi-ngan (Tiffany Lau), who was the first runner-up for Miss Hong Kong, and actress/showbiz baby Wan Chor-yue (Joey Thye), among others, on their journey towards living their dreams.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES - EP 9
programme.desc: Ching wins, but the raving Chau greatly annoys to invade Wong. At the end ,all of them are driven out of the Island. Afterwards, Ching and Yung have to overcome many obstacles before they can be reunited again._x000D_On the other hand, Hong and the Kam Emperor, in order to invade the Sung Dynasty , Plot to steal Wu’s book ’ The Art of War’ from Sung. Their conspiracy is know by Ching and Yung , and they vow to protect their own country.

programme.title: Crimson Sabre - EP 29
programme.desc: The Government in late Qing Dynasty was so corrupt that good and loyal officials and their families were being exterminated. Among these victims were Woon and his son Chi (Lam Ka Tung). Fortunately, Chi was saved by the "Golden Snake" Yi (Kong Wa) and was sent to learn martial arts in Wah Shan. Yi, on the other hand, went to take revenge on the Wan’s, the renowned house of bandits, and took hostage of their daughter Yee (Melissa Ng).

After getting married, she takes care of her father-in-law Ko Au (Lee Ka Ting), big sister-in-law Ko Ching-lai (Yuen Kit Yee), younger brother-in-law Ko Tai-kiu (Brian Chu) and stepson Ko Hei-long, who collectively make up a dysfunctional family. She has become a proper housewife after five years.
