programme.desc: Longtime friends Lau Tak-wing (Dickson Yu) and Chai Hing-chau (Karl Ting) are so eager to be admitted into the Artist Training Program that they push each other to their physical limits. In their dogged pursuit for stardom, the pair is joined by Keung Chi-ngan (Tiffany Lau), who was the first runner-up for Miss Hong Kong, and actress/showbiz baby Wan Chor-yue (Joey Thye), among others, on their journey towards living their dreams.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES - EP 10
programme.desc: TVB’s across century billion-dollar production shows you the legend of a property giant._x000D__x000D_The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities.

programme.title: Crimson Sabre - EP 31
programme.desc: The Government in late Qing Dynasty was so corrupt that good and loyal officials and their families were being exterminated. Among these victims were Woon and his son Chi (Lam Ka Tung). Fortunately, Chi was saved by the "Golden Snake" Yi (Kong Wa) and was sent to learn martial arts in Wah Shan. Yi, on the other hand, went to take revenge on the Wan’s, the renowned house of bandits, and took hostage of their daughter Yee (Melissa Ng).

programme.title: Crimson Sabre - EP 32
programme.desc: The Government in late Qing Dynasty was so corrupt that good and loyal officials and their families were being exterminated. Among these victims were Woon and his son Chi (Lam Ka Tung). Fortunately, Chi was saved by the "Golden Snake" Yi (Kong Wa) and was sent to learn martial arts in Wah Shan. Yi, on the other hand, went to take revenge on the Wan’s, the renowned house of bandits, and took hostage of their daughter Yee (Melissa Ng).

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Riley's mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: Maybe It's Love
programme.desc: A girl Marble witnesses a murder case and reports it to the police. After much investigation, the police can only sort out the complicated relationships between a rich merchant's mistress, a postman, a shop owner and his wife, but find no clue as to who the murderer is. Therefore, Marble decides to carry out her own investigation...

programme.title: The Conman 2002
programme.desc: Li Ka Shing has lived his entire life as a luckless guy, until he is advised by a master to move his ancestral tomb so as to change his luck. From that day onwards, Li wins at every game in the casino. When his rival uncovers the secret, he destroys Li's ancestral tomb to gain the upper hand. Will Li win the finals of the gambling competition?

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: A Hero Never Dies
programme.desc: Jack and Martin admire each other, but they work for two different underworld bosses. During a fight in Thailand, Martin is crippled while Jack is seriously wounded. Both men are left behind by their bosses, and their girlfriends killed. It is time for the heroes to team up and fight back...

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: Anna in Kungfu-Land
programme.desc: An advertising executive, Kin, launches a martial arts tournament as an advertising campaign for his client. He travels to Japan to invite Shaolin descendant, Anna, to join the tournament. This results in attracting the eccentric masters of other eight sects to join too. As the tournament approaches, Kin and Anna unconsciously fall for each other...

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the other's mole.

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the family's gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: God of Gambler's Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jin's pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wife's death.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quin's trust, Nick becomes his protege and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: After being betrayed by Zhuo, the white-haired witch Lian seeks revenge by slaughtering her way through the eight martial arts clans. However, she is soon attacked by a man whose bride she has abducted. Meanwhile, Zhuo, who is waiting on a hilltop for a flower to bloom for Lian's restoration, hastens to save her upon realizing the danger she is in.

programme.title: The Longest Nite
programme.desc: Two triad leaders, George and Kei, negotiate to join forces. As a bounty of $5 million is put on killing George, Kei assigns Sam, a corrupt cop who is also his right-hand man, to stop the killers. In the process, Sam meets a bald killer Tony, who stalks him and causes him troubles. When Sam realizes he is being set up, it was already too late...

programme.title: Diary
programme.desc: After breaking up with her boyfriend, Winnie starts to regularly write a diary and indulges in her own imagination. She meets Ray who looks exactly like her ex-boyfriend one day and they quickly fall in love, but the relationship soon fades away. Is Ray no longer in love with Winnie or is it just her imagining that he wants a break up?

programme.title: The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: Li attempts to make a fortune at the horse-racing tracks, but is subsequently entangled with loan sharks. Li becomes debt-laden while his sons are harassed by debt collectors, when more heart-wrenching events begin to unfold.

programme.title: Happy Family
programme.desc: Sang, the only son of a rich family, falls in love with Kaka. They plan to get married, but Sang's father stops him from marrying her because she is his half-sister. Later, Sang falls in love with another girl who turns out to be his half-sister too. With Sang devastated, his mother unveils yet another big secret...

programme.title: Chungking Express
programme.desc: Two Hong Kong urban love stories depicting two Hong Kong policemen, both jilted by ex-lovers and falling in love again. One falls for a mysterious female underworld figure while the other is in love with a beautiful and witty server at a fast food restaurant he frequents.

programme.title: In Laws, Out Laws
programme.desc: When priceless antiques were found in the backyard of Auntie Kang's home, the family finds themselves becoming sudden millionaires. Their arguments and disagreements lead to hilarious results as each of Auntie Kang's sons tries his darnedest to get the biggest shares!

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: A heroic tale about Hong Kong's brave firefighters. These courageous men can march into disastrous firegrounds and risk their lives to save others. However, do they have the same courage to confront their personal issues?

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: The Sparrow
programme.desc: Kei is an experienced "Sparrow", a pickpocket who likes to take photos of the people and events around him. One day, a mysterious yet beautiful woman, Jenny, appears in his viewfinder and Kei is instantly attracted to her. Jenny's beauty fascinates Kei, but behind this attractive facade lies a mysterious past and a secret mission...

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: As Wudang disciple Zhuo Yi Hang confronts the Demon Palace, he reunites with Lian Ni Shang, the woman who once saved him, and their love reignites. Lian, a disciple of the Demon Palace, endures torment to stay with Zhuo but is shattered when he accidentally injures her. A fierce battle between good and evil begins to unfold!

programme.title: Wonder Women
programme.desc: This is the story about a career woman and her friend going through life with their resilience and perseverance during the highs and lows of the Hong Kong economy over a decade, from the Handover in 1997 through 2007.

programme.title: The Death Curse
programme.desc: The medical scientist Tin distributes his inheritance among his eight children from different wives before he dies. Under the supervision of Lawyer Cheung, the eight siblings must gather and pray in their father's old haunted mansion every midnight, otherwise they will lose their right of inheritance.

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy, where a murdered police officer returns from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie cop into avenging his death.

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack...

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Gambler's Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jin's daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: Poor student Lin is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises him because of his family's declining status. Lin visits his fiancee before leaving for the Imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin's bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and manages to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan, Madam White Bone and her sexy sister, and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: The Tiger and the Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: Swift Sword
programme.desc: A righteous swordsman, Bai Yi Pang, seeks revenge on an evil clan but is crippled after being beaten up by them. Years later, a young man encounters Bai who is hiding in a cave. Bai decides to teach this determined young man his Swift Sword skills so that he can help Bai take revenge on the evil clan.

programme.title: The Imperial Tomb Raiders
programme.desc: The story revolves around a maverick, a band of woman warriors and a group of ruthless bandits. The maverick teams up with the woman warriors to battle the bandits seeking to raid the emperor's tomb.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (who's done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, it's the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. It's a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because people's lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, vow to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor due to their bullying ways. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple's brothel.

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers' claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70's Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister's magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yen's property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love...

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: Call to Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - "Twelve Deadly Coins" and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: Woman of the Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Citizens' Subjects
programme.desc: Citizens' Subjects utilizes the perspective of Taiwan people and Taiwan events to tell the stories of Taiwan. It takes a light-hearted, humorous approach to interpreting current affairs.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Global Focus
programme.desc: Bringing you the latest political, economy, information technology and breaking news around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Shao Kang's War Room
programme.desc: Shao Kang's War Room is a Talkshow hosted by Zhao Shao Kang. This programme combines TVBS News source and Mr. Zhao's rich political and media background, to analyse important news deeply.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Super Taste: Hungry Generations
programme.desc: Super Taste focuses on funny travel style to discover destinations and local-dishes. Standing on audience's view point, program's hosts introduce every sightseeing sites with close-witness, young and humorous way to announce the spirits of Super Taste.

programme.title: Focus World News
programme.desc: A news programme that provides the latest international and Taiwan news, as well as in-depth analyses of important issues around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Queen

programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 16
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: The Midnight Studio - EP 2
programme.desc: The series tells a thrilling story of mean photographer Seo Ki Joo (Joo Won) who runs a photo studio that exists only for the deceased, passionate lawyer Han Boo (Kwon Nara) and the eerie night visitors, who travel between life and death.

programme.title: Treasures Around - EP 23
programme.desc: The quirky and clever Shan Dandan (Xu Lu), who dreams of becoming a jade appraiser, crosses paths with Pei Pei (Bi Wen Jun), the wayward heir to a jade business. Initially at odds, the two develop a love-hate relationship as they face challenges together.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1904
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Darkside of the Moon - EP 6
programme.desc: She Manyue (Tavia Yeung) appears to be a glamorous and skilled crisis management expert, but she has a tragic past. Eighteen years ago, she and her sister were assaulted by wealthy heir Jiang Jijun (Edward Ma), leading to a devastating upheaval in her family.

programme.title: Kill Me Love Me - EP 14
programme.desc: The story follows Prince Murong Jinghe of the Dayan Kingdom (Liu Xueyi) and a young girl Mei Lin (Wu Jinyan), from Qingzhou, as they support each other through the tides of fate. They bravely defy destiny, risking their lives to break free and persevere.
